name: Pallet Puffballs
description:
Your name is Farmhand, and you're a sheep herder! Your job: To send the roaming colorful puffballs back home! Grab the sheep and throw them in the correctly colored portals. Get going and compete for the quickest time!

Since we're in space, there's different names for the color terms:
Redd instead of Red
Grween instead of Green
Blu instead of Blue
And Pallet instead of Palette
Hope you enjoy the space terminology!

Made together by:
-ef424s: https://ef424s.itch.io/
-LuLu030: https://lulu030.itch.io/
-XenoCore: https://xenocore.itch.io/

Current high score: 37.1 sec
